articles.title: Bird flu is raging, adding to the risks for food inflation - The Straits Times
articles.description: More than 40 countries across Europe, Asia and Africa have seen outbreaks since May, according to World Organisation for Animal Health data.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
LONDON (BLOOMBERG) - The world's poultry farmers are battling another grim spell of bird-flu cases, risking higher chicken prices and fewer free-range eggs.

articles.title: Is Europe entering a golden age of astronomy? - Phys.org
articles.description: Groundbreaking discoveries about gravitational waves, black holes, cosmic rays, neutrinos and other areas of cutting-edge astronomy may soon become more frequent due to the convergence of two major communities of astronomers in a fresh project.
